description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2f41o","text":"Antipsychotics are known to induce the expression of several immediate early genes (IEGs) via D2R antagonism, which then leads to changes in critical signaling pathways in iSPNs. To define the impact of LRRK2 kinase activity on the expression pattern of IEGs in the iSPNs, we used multicolored single-molecule fluorescence in situ hybridization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":254,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Aligning Science Across Parkinson's [ASAP-020600] through the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research (MJFF)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4fq6r","text":"Place a piece of aluminum foil into a small Styrofoam container containing dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6frtm","text":"Mice were euthanized with carbon dioxide, decapitated, their brains rapidly removed, and placed immediately on foil on dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dovm7","text":"Pour ~50 mL of 2-methylbutance into the container. Keep brain in container for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9i527","text":"When the brain is completely frozen, carefully remove it from the foil with forceps and place it in","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7hg9","text":"the OCT mold. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"en8i5","text":"Pour ~50 mL of 2-methylbutance into the container. Keep brain in container for 3 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8alpg","text":"Cover the top of the mold with tin foil and store the brain in -80°C freezer. Place the brain into -20°C freezer 20 mins before cryosection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6bri","text":"collect the region of interest with 20μm slices and mount by turning the slide upside down and pressing against the slice on theplatform.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2em18","text":"Place slides in slide box and store slides in -80°C freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bf92l","text":"Prepare 200 mL of 4% PFA and chilled to 4°C:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Pretreat samples with Hydrogen Peroxide and Protease
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ek41","text":"Load the slides into the EZ-Batch holder, and add 5 drops of RNAscope Hydrogen Peroxide to each section (completely cover the sections). incubate at RT for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5j9vh","text":"Place slides in the staining tank containing chilled 4% PFA in fridge (4°C) for 30mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8b7tu","text":"Wash slides in 1X PBS by moving the rack gently up and down for 2 minutes and repeat with fresh 1X PBS (room temperature)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97nkn","text":"Place slide rack in new staining tank containing 200 mL of 50% EtOH for 5 minutes at room temperature. Gently agitate slides by moving rack up and down 2-4 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4e4nr","text":"Place slide rack in new staining tank containing 200 mL of 70% EtOH for 5 minutes at room temperature. Gently agitate slides by moving rack up and down 2-4 times.     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ij0k","text":"Place slide rack in new staining tank containing 200 mL of 100% EtOH for 5 minutes at room temperature. Gently agitate slides by moving rack up and down 2-4 times. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hql8","text":"Place slide rack in new staining tank containing 200 mL of 100% EtOH for 5 minutes at room temperature. Gently agitate slides by moving rack up and down 2-4 times. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3u6jp","text":"Turn on the HbyEZ oven and prepare the humidity contral tray by applying ~40 mL of MilliQ water to paper towels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"asnjv","text":"Allow Protease IV to come to RT (normally stored at 4°C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2grm3","text":"Warm probes for 10-15 minutes at 40°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"89qqe","text":"Practice making hydrophobic barriers using ImmEdge pen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6o8ij","text":"Remove probes from oven, allow to come to RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Pretreat samples with Hydrogen Peroxide and Protease
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8p2hv","text":"Place the EZ-Batch holder into the wash tray containing 200ml distilled water.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Pretreat samples with Hydrogen Peroxide and Protease
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"48bpn","text":"Repeat the wash step with fresh water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Pretreat samples with Hydrogen Peroxide and Protease
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cu5n4","text":"Add 5 drops of RNAscope Protease IV to each section (completely cover the sections). incubate at RT for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Pretreat samples with Hydrogen Peroxide and Protease
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"q8v5","text":"Place the EZ-Batch holder into the wash tray containing 200ml PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Pretreat samples with Hydrogen Peroxide and Protease
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3c86q","text":"Repeat the wash step with fresh PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e6ra5","text":"Preparing probes by ratio 50:1:1 for channels 1, 2, and 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Pretreat samples with Hydrogen Peroxide and Protease
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c1bm2","text":"Allow slides to dry. Collect excess PBS with Kimwipe","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bsheg","text":"Add mixed probes to each section. Apply ~100 μL of probe combination to each section (completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C  for 2hrs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvm3c","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnrpr","text":"Apply ~3 drops of Amp 2 to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5a8bl","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6t7cg","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b0igd","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58ogs","text":"Apply ~3 drops of Amp 1 to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bqp3m","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"av8pu","text":" Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4v5tv","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"arv9v","text":"30 minutes before the end of incubation: remove amps from the fridge and allow amps to come to RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bgd5r","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5n459","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7g7rm","text":"Apply ~3 drops of Amp 3 to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 15 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2jmh7","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a169l","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1d9kb","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c19at","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f735t","text":"Apply ~3 drops of HRP blocker to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 15 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"28en9","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bgivo","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"127jk","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bibul","text":"Apply 150μl of Opal 520 to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d2803","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4irl0","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ipaf","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fl9ma","text":"Apply ~3 drops of HRP-C1 to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 15 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6m2p6","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6a37v","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73o88","text":"Apply ~3 drops of HRP blocker to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 15 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1m4eq","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cuvjd","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpajg","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2taoe","text":"Apply 150μl of Opal 570 to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"14g0t","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"egtlb","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebit3","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32uup","text":"Apply ~3 drops of HRP-C2 to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 15 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dtk97","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"94j5i","text":"Apply ~3 drops of DAPI to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at RT for 1 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8tt6b","text":"Apply 150μl of Opal 650 to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b94e0","text":"Apply ~3 drops of HRP-C3 to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 15 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"faput","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dphbv","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpajg","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cuvjd","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1m4eq","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpajg","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cuvjd","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1m4eq","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpajg","text":"Flick off excess liquid and wash slides in 1X Wash Buffer (200ml) for 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cuvjd","text":"Repeat with fresh 1X Wash Buffer in fresh wash buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1m4eq","text":"Remove excess liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c8vju","text":"Apply ~3 drops of HRP blocker to each section(completely cover the sections) and incubate at 40°C for 15 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47b26","text":"Flick off excess liquid and mount the slides with Prolong Diamond Antifade mountant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3tqu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"u4gs","text":"Allow slides to dry in protected and covered area overnight. store slides in the dark at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"111hq","text":"Sections were imaged with the Nikon A1 laser microscope system using a 60X 0.75NA objective, to capture 3 z-stack images across 4 channels:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2noem","text":"DAPI channel was enhanced with Enhance Or Suppress Features module, with feature size set at pixel size 30.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"hdso","text":" Nur77 or Arc object pixel unit was set for Min 1, Max10, threshold strategy for Global and thresholding method set as Manual","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"25ajn","text":"Drd1 or Drd2 channel was enhanced with Enhance Or Suppress Features module, with feature size set at pixel size 10","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"83r26","text":"Identify Primary Objects module was implemented on identified nuclei, object pixel unit was set for Min 5, Max 50, with threshold strategy set as Global and thresholding method set as Otsu","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3cmv5","text":"Masked D1 positive nuclei and Masked D2 positive nuclei were generated with RelateObjects","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2im6q","text":"Identify Primary Objects module was implemented on identified Drd1 or Drd2 signal puncta, object pixel unit was set for Min 3, Max30, threshold strategy for Global and thresholding method set as Manual","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":62,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":70,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e84r2","text":"Nr4a1 or Arc channel was enhanced with Enhance Or Suppress Features module, with feature size set at pixel size 5.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":5},{"style":"italic","offset":9,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbu2h","text":" The number of objects were measured with the Measure Object Intensity module.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
